POLITICA-LINHA4: This website is maintained and operated by Pet Show LTDA.
POLITICA-LINHA5: We collect and use some personal data that belongs to those who use our website. In doing so, we act as the controller of such data and are subject to the provisions of Federal Law no. 13,709 / 2018 (General Law on Protection of Personal Data - LGPD).
POLITICA-LINHA6: We take care of the protection of your personal data and, therefore, we provide this privacy policy, which contains information about:
POLITICA-LINHA9: What data we collect and what we do with it;
POLITICA-LINHA10: Your rights in relation to your personal data; and
POLITICA-LINHA14: Our website should only be used by people over eighteen years of age. Therefore, children and adolescents should not use it.
POLITICA-LINHA15: 2. Data we collect and reasons for collection
POLITICA-LINHA16: Our website collects and uses some personal data from our users, in accordance with the provisions of this section.
POLITICA-LINHA17: 2.1. Personal data provided expressly by the user
POLITICA-LINHA18: We collect the following personal data that our users expressly provide to us when using our website:
POLITICA-LINHA20: Personal Information . When you register, we collect your full name, CPF (Brazilian ID), e-mail, day of birth, address, contact phone number, and zip code and additional information deemed essential by You to provide the service.
POLITICA-LINHA21: Payment methods . When You hire a Service through the Website , You will be able to make the payment through the payment methods available on our platform. In this case, the bank or credit card details that You will provide will be collected directly by the credit card companies, financial institutions and other means of payment, without any involvement from Pet Show LTDA. Do not use a payment method if you do not agree with how this service handles your information.
POLITICA-LINHA22: Pet information : species, breed, weight, behavioral data, type of food you are used to, emergency contacts, health status, medicines and vaccines. For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, the Pet's information will be considered personal information in conjunction with the Service Borrower's information.
POLITICA-LINHA23: Non-Personal Information . We may collect information and data about your browsing experience on our website . During your visit on the Website, your Internet Protocol (IP), your location, your computer type, browser type, pages and services accessed, among others , may be automatically collected.
POLITICA-LINHA25: The collection of this data occurs at the following moment (s):
POLITICA-LINHA26: at the registration of a new user.
POLITICA-LINHA27: at the use of the Website's features
POLITICA-LINHA28: in cookies . Cookies are identifications of the interaction with our Website or our advertisements that are transferred to the user's device in order to recognize it in the next navigation. We use cookies to provide a better experience on our website and provide personalized features such as recommendations for articles and advertisements and additional information of interest.
POLITICA-LINHA31: The data provided by our users is collected for the following purposes:
POLITICA-LINHA33: so that the user can purchase our products and services;
POLITICA-LINHA34: so that we can send data from the service provided by e-mail to the user;
POLITICA-LINHA35: so that we can send offers to our users.
POLITICA-LINHA37: 2.2 Personal data obtained in other ways
POLITICA-LINHA38: We collect the following personal data from our users:
POLITICA-LINHA42: transaction data made through the website.
POLITICA-LINHA44: The collection of this data occurs at the following times:
POLITICA-LINHA46: when the user logs in and out of the site;
POLITICA-LINHA47: when the user makes a service appointment;
POLITICA-LINHA48: when the user searches for services on the website;
POLITICA-LINHA49: when the user clicks on a service or profile of a provider.
POLITICA-LINHA51: These data will be collected for the following purposes:
POLITICA-LINHA53: guarantee the security and authenticity of the transactions made on the website;
POLITICA-LINHA54: comply with the legal determination to store application access records;
POLITICA-LINHA58: It will not be collected from the sensitive of our users, thus understood those defined in art. 11 et seq. Of the Personal Data Protection Law. Thus, there will be no data collection on racial or ethnic origin, religious conviction, political opinion, union membership or religious, philosophical or political organization, health or sexual life data, genetic or biometric data, when linked to a natural person.
POLITICA-LINHA61: Cookies are small text files automatically downloaded to your device when you access and browse a website. They basically serve to identify devices, activities and user preferences.
POLITICA-LINHA62: Cookies do not allow any files or information to be extracted from the user's hard drive, and it is not yet possible to access personal information that has not come from the user or the way he uses the website's resources.
POLITICA-LINHA64: Site cookies are those sent to the user's and administrator's computer or device exclusively by the site.
POLITICA-LINHA65: The information collected through these cookies is used to improve and personalize the user experience, and some cookies can, for example, be used to remember the user's chosen preferences, as well as to offer personalized content.
POLITICA-LINHA67: The user will be able to oppose the registration of cookies by the website, if he only deactivates this option in his own browser. More information on how to do this in some of the main browsers used today can be accessed from the following links:
POLITICA-LINHA75: The deactivation of cookies, however, can affect the availability of some tools and functionalities of the website, compromising its correct and expected functioning. Another possible consequence is the removal of user preferences that may have been saved, damaging their experience.
POLITICA-LINHA77: 3. Sharing personal data with third parties
POLITICA-LINHA78: We do not share your personal data with third parties. In spite of this, it is possible that we do so to comply with some legal or regulatory determination, or, still, to comply with some order issued by public authority.
POLITICA-LINHA80: 4. How long will your personal data be stored
POLITICA-LINHA81: The personal data collected by the website are stored and used for a period of time that corresponds to what is necessary to achieve the purposes listed in this document and that considers the rights of its owners, the rights of the website controller and the applicable legal or regulatory provisions.
POLITICA-LINHA82: Once the periods for storing personal data have expired, they are removed from our databases or anonymized, except in cases where there is the possibility or the need for storage due to legal or regulatory provision.
POLITICA-LINHA84: 5. Legal bases for the processing of personal data
POLITICA-LINHA85: A legal basis for the processing of personal data is nothing more than a legal basis, provided by law, that justifies it. Thus, each operation of processing personal data must have a corresponding legal basis.
POLITICA-LINHA86: We treat our users' personal data in the following cases:
POLITICA-LINHA88: upon the consent of the holder of personal data;
POLITICA-LINHA89: For the fulfillment of legal or regulatory obligation by the controller;
POLITICA-LINHA90: For the regular exercise of rights in judicial, administrative or arbitral proceedings;
POLITICA-LINHA91: For the execution of a contract or preliminary procedures related to a contract to which the holder belongs, at the request of the holder of personal data;
POLITICA-LINHA92: when necessary to serve the legitimate interests of the controller or third party;
POLITICA-LINHA96: Certain operations for the processing of personal data carried out on our website will depend on the user's prior agreement, who must express it in a free, informed and unambiguous manner.
POLITICA-LINHA97: The user can revoke his consent at any time, and, if there is no legal possibility that allows or requires the storage of data, the data provided by consent will be deleted.
POLITICA-LINHA98: In addition, if desired, the user may not agree to any operation of processing personal data based on consent. In these cases, however, it is possible that you will not be able to use any functionality of the website that depends on that operation. The consequences of a lack of consent for a specific activity are reported prior to treatment.
POLITICA-LINHA99: 5.2. Compliance with legal or regulatory obligation by the controller
POLITICA-LINHA100: Some operations of processing personal data, especially data storage, will be carried out so that we can comply with obligations provided for by law or other normative provisions applicable to our activities.
POLITICA-LINHA102: For the execution of the purchase and sale contract or the provision of services eventually signed between the site and the user, other data related to or necessary for its execution, including the content of any communications with the user, may be collected and stored.
POLITICA-LINHA104: For certain personal data processing operations, we rely solely on our legitimate interest. To find out more about which cases, specifically, we use this legal basis, or for more information about the tests we do to make sure we can use it, contact our Personal Data Protection Officer for any of the channels informed in this Privacy Policy, in the section “How to contact us”.
POLITICA-LINHA107: The user of the website has the following rights, conferred by the Personal Data Protection Law:
POLITICA-LINHA109: confirmation of the existence of treatment;
POLITICA-LINHA111: correction of incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data;
POLITICA-LINHA112: anonymizing, blocking or deleting unnecessary, excessive or treated data in non-compliance with the provisions of the law;
POLITICA-LINHA113: portability of data to another service or product supplier, upon express request, in accordance with the regulations of the national authority, subject to commercial and industrial secrets;
POLITICA-LINHA114: elimination of personal data processed with the consent of the holder, except in cases provided for by law;
POLITICA-LINHA115: information from public and private entities with which the controller shared data use;
POLITICA-LINHA116: information about the possibility of not giving consent and about the consequences of the refusal;
POLITICA-LINHA119: It is important to note that, under the terms of the LGPD, there is no right to delete data treated on the basis of legal bases other than consent, unless the data is unnecessary, excessive or treated in non-compliance with the law.
POLITICA-LINHA120: 6.1. How the holder can exercise his rights
POLITICA-LINHA121: Holders of personal data processed by us will be able to exercise their rights by sending a message, either by e-mail or by correspondence to our Personal Data Protection Officer. The necessary information for this is in the 'How to contact us' section of this Privacy Policy.
POLITICA-LINHA122: In order to guarantee that the user who intends to exercise his rights is, in fact, the holder of the personal data object of the request, we may request documents or other information that may assist in his correct identification, in order to safeguard our rights and the rights of third parties. This will only be done, however, if absolutely necessary, and the applicant will receive all related information.
POLITICA-LINHA124: 7. Security measures in the processing of personal data
POLITICA-LINHA125: We employ technical and organizational measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access and situations of destruction, loss, loss or alteration of that data.
POLITICA-LINHA126: The measures we use take into account the nature of the data, the context and purpose of the treatment, the risks that an eventual violation would generate for the user's rights and freedoms, and the standards currently used in the market by companies similar to ours.
POLITICA-LINHA127: Among the security measures adopted by us, we highlight the following:
POLITICA-LINHA129: Our users' data is stored in a secure environment;
POLITICA-LINHA130: We limit access to our users' data, so that unauthorized third parties cannot access it;
POLITICA-LINHA131: We use SSL (Secure Socket Layer) certificate, so that data transmission between users' devices and our servers takes place in encrypted form;
POLITICA-LINHA134: We keep records of all those who, in some way, have contact with our data.
POLITICA-LINHA136: Even if it adopts everything in its power to avoid security incidents, it is possible that there may be a problem motivated exclusively by a third party - such as in the case of hacker or cracker attacks or, even in the case of the user's exclusive fault, it occurs, for example, when he himself transfers his data to a third party. Thus, although we are generally responsible for the personal data we process, we are exempt from liability in the event of an exceptional situation like these, over which we have no control.
POLITICA-LINHA137: In any case, in the event of any type of security incident that may generate significant risk or damage to any of our users, we will communicate those affected and the National Data Protection Authority about the incident, in accordance with the provisions of the General Protection Law of Data.
POLITICA-LINHA140: This version of this Privacy Policy was last updated on: 10/29/2020.
POLITICA-LINHA141: We reserve the right to modify these rules at any time, especially to adapt them to any changes made to our website, either by making new features available, or by suppressing or modifying existing ones.
POLITICA-LINHA142: Whenever there is a change, our users will be notified of the change.
POLITICA-LINHA145: To clarify any doubts about this Privacy Policy or the personal data we process, please contact us, through any of the channels mentioned below:
